message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to part with it for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to consider a price of $11000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value you mentioned.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13500. It's a fair compromise considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value you mentioned.

I understand that you're trying to be reasonable, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12500. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13000. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $12500, but I'm not willing to go any higher. I think that's a fair price considering the value you mentioned.
